lead_paragraph: The Orlando Magic has pulled its qualifying offer for the free agent Darko Milicic, making it unlikely that he will return to the team.Milicic, a 7-foot center, was a restricted free agent, meaning Orlando could have matched any offer he received. The change, which was announced Tuesday, means he can sign with any team.Magic officials have said they want to retain Milicic, but they are also shopping for a free-agent scorer.
